item.title: Trump discloses U.S. targeted a third alleged drug boat from Venezuela
item.description: The president acknowledged the incident while delivering a warning to Venezuela’s president, Nicolás Maduro.

item.title: More Epstein documents come from the Hill
item.description: The House Oversight Committee released a list of contacts, a deposition with former Attorney General Bill Barr and other documents.

item.title: Trump files defamation and libel lawsuit against New York Times
item.description: President accuses the newspaper and its reporters of defaming him in a book and three articles he said were “false and defamatory.”
